price: 98. Or, did the people of the towns then feel secure against the coming of Our punishment in the forenoon while they were playing?
arabic: أَوَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُم بَأۡسُنَا ضُحٗى وَهُمۡ يَلۡعَبُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: awa-amina ahlu al-qurā an yatiyahum basunā ḍuḥan wahum yalʿabūna
